page.title: 17THE MEDIA OF BRENTWOOD
page.content: Brentwood's local newspaper is {The {Gazette.}It is part of a group of newspapers which also include {The {Romford and Havering Observer, The {Billericay Gazette}and {The Essex {Chronicle.}One senior reporter,chief reporter,junior reporter and one part-time political reporter work on the paper along with 5 photographers, news editor, sub-editor and editor. The group started in{1788,}founded by William Strupar, but{The Gazette} has only been running since{1919.}The bulk of the paper contains advertise- ments so the size of it varies each week. It informs the public of activit -ies in the vicinity and reports all relevant local news. Since the M25 opened in 1984, the number of motoring offences has trebled but offenders have not necessarily been from Brentwood.
